text: This is a list of yearly claims to an Independent Southern basketball championship from 1895 to 1932 (those not in the Southern Intercollegiate Athletic Association from 1895–1921, those not in the South Atlantic Intercollegiate Athletic Association from 1912–1921, and those not in the Southern Conference from 1922–1932), prior to the creation of the Southeastern Conference in 1933. * 1919 – Centre ==Notes== ==References== Category:College men's basketball in the United States
title: List of independent southern basketball champions
